scripts.say: See that building over there made of sparkling obsidian? That's our base.
How'd you get artillery up there?! This is way beyond the definition of "base," it's a straight-up fort...
Actually, everything above ground is just a decoy, the real base is hidden underwater. You can only enter through a secret entrance, so follow me.
The structure above ground draws attention away from the true fortification below ground... Now I see why you call it a secret base.
I'm honestly amazed that Aqua's and Matsuri's base would come in handy one day. As that one guy said, life's like a box of chocolates.
Alright everyone, take a deep breath and follow me~
